title: Solutions to the Massive HLW IIA Supergravity
abstract: We find new supersymmetric solutions of the massive supergravity theory which can be constructed by generalized Scherk-Schwarz dimensional reduction of eleven dimensional supergravity, using the scaling symmetry of the equations of motion. Firstly, we construct field configurations which solve the ten dimensional equations of motion by reducing on the radial direction of Ricci-flat cones. Secondly, we will extend this result to the supersymmetric case by performing a dimensional reduction along the flow of a homothetic Killing vector which is the Euler vector of the cone plus a boost.
